name: Phoenix Uprising
description:
Overview

Wander the small decrepit bunker as you put yourself in the shoes of those oppressed by the totalitarian powers at play. This is 1/3 of an ARG for a university project, click here to play from the start.

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • E - Inspect
  • Mouse - Look
  • Right Click - Zoom  
  • Escape - Pause
